title: Add Ronaldo goal-kick pictures to the Cute Football mini-game

requirements.text: Add new static images to the Cute Football mini-game to depict Cristiano Ronaldo kicking a ball into a goalpost, and update the mini-game UI to display these images during gameplay (idle/aiming, kick action, and goal/miss result states).

quotes: can you add pictures in the football game, where ronaldo is kicking the goals into the goalpost

acceptanceCriteria: New images are added as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated using the filenames specified in this build request.
MiniGameCuteFootball renders a Ronaldo-kicking visual scene (player + goalpost) in place of or alongside the current ball/goal visuals.
When the player clicks "Kick!", the on-screen visuals clearly reflect a kick moment (e.g., player pose changes and/or ball movement) using the added images.
When the result is a goal, the on-screen visuals clearly reflect a successful shot into the goal (e.g., goal/celebration variant).
When the result is a miss, the on-screen visuals clearly reflect a miss (e.g., miss variant) without breaking existing game flow (attempts, goals, next kick, game over).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not edit frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep all changes within the existing single-frontend app; no new backend logic is required for static images.
nonGoals: Do not change game rules, difficulty tuning constants, or win/lose conditions beyond what is necessary to render the new images.
Do not add backend storage or fetching of images; images must be served as static assets.

required: Stylized illustration of Cristiano Ronaldo mid-kick (ronaldo-kick.dim_768x768.png)
Stylized illustration of a football goalpost/net (goalpost.dim_768x512.png)
Stylized illustration of a football in motion with motion blur/trail (football-motion.dim_512x512.png)
Stylized illustration of Cristiano Ronaldo celebrating after scoring (ronaldo-celebrate.dim_768x768.png)
Stylized illustration of Cristiano Ronaldo reacting to a miss (ronaldo-miss.dim_768x768.png)
